controversies: Fair lending settlement with the U.S. Department of Justice

social_issues: Allegations of avoiding mortgage services in minority neighborhoods
Customer complaints regarding poor service and operational inefficiencies
governance_issues: Regulatory scrutiny and compliance measures following the fair lending settlement
